entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:15AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf Friday into Saturday... Elevated surf will develop Friday and continue into Saturday. Northwest winds of 20 to 30 mph are expected Friday into Saturday causing waves to wash up near the top of the beach. Minor beach erosion may occur and belongings left on the beach could wash away.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley; Chukchi Sea Coast; Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula
